body:
As the title says, this is the Avicus Challenge #1, open for anyone to try and defeat. The task itself is simple: in Venomous TDM, kill 5 players in 1 life with your pickax. Record it and post your responses below. [There is no reward, other than the joy of victory] 

Restrictions:
-You may not boost off of one player
-Spawn Killing, Hacking, etc.
body_tagged:

-Spawn Killing, Hacking, etc.
title: Avicus Challenge #1

replies.body:
"[There is no reward, other than the joy of victory]"
Ohhh silly zieno... No. :p
replies.body_tagged:
"[There is no reward, other than the joy of victory]"
Ohhh silly zieno... No. :p

replies.body: This will be hard to achieve since when VenomousTDM cycles i see a million regulars join (who will probably hit you by then) before being able to kill them with a pick.
replies.body_tagged: This will be hard to achieve since when VenomousTDM cycles i see a million regulars join (who will probably hit you by then) before being able to kill them with a pick.

replies.body: Ez. I have a idea on how, but alas. too many variables would make this hard, but the doing part would be easy
replies.body_tagged: Ez. I have a idea on how, but alas. too many variables would make this hard, but the doing part would be easy

replies.body: Diamond pickaxe does the same damage as a stone sword so it shouldnt be too hard
replies.body_tagged: Diamond pickaxe does the same damage as a stone sword so it shouldnt be too hard

replies.body: I would. But I don't have a recording software

replies.body: Venomous TDM is a 1 hit kill map so it would be hard.
replies.body_tagged: Venomous TDM is a 1 hit kill map so it would be hard.
